question:
Consider the following:
  1. Chief Ministers of different States
  2. Lieutenant-Governors of the Union Territories
  3. Union Cabinet Secretary 
Which of the above is/are member(s) of Governing Council of NITI Aayog?
explanation: Governing Council of NITI Aayog consist of CMs of States and Lieutenant-Governors of the Union Territories. Cabinet Secretary is not the member of governing council.
